pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: head (chief, director) of a section or department

lessons.japanese: 各部門の優勝候補が集まった。
lessons.english: The top favorites of each section were gathered together.

lessons.japanese: 委員会は５つの部門に分かれた。
lessons.english: The committee divided into five sections.

lessons.japanese: その本は図書館の歴史部門で見つかるよ。
lessons.english: You'll find that book in the historical section of the library.

lessons.japanese: この会社は通信部門でよく知られている。
lessons.english: This corporation is well known for its communication equipment.

lessons.japanese: 歴史学は人文科学の一部門である。
lessons.english: History is a branch of the humanities.

lessons.japanese: 彼は社長がその部門の廃止を決定したことを知らなかった。
lessons.english: He wasn't conscious of the president's decision to drop the line.

lessons.japanese: 彼は企画部門に属している。
lessons.english: He belongs to the planning section.

lessons.japanese: 代数は数学の１部門です。
lessons.english: Algebra is a branch of mathematics.

lessons.japanese: 製造部門は新しい金融政策に動揺しています。
lessons.english: The manufacturing sector is a frenzy over the new monetary policy.

lessons.japanese: 私は営業部門の一員です。
lessons.english: I am a member of the sales department.

lessons.japanese: 公益事業部門の急成長を見込んでいます。
lessons.english: We expect rapid growth of the utilities sector.

lessons.japanese: 各部門の優勝候補が集まった。
lessons.english: The top favorites of each section were gathered together.
